parse.title: User:低调虐菜=小七-文库使用账户/未知的卡拉尼语生肉

wikitext.*:
阿拉纳克：

Krisal thok aran!

歼灭：

Adun Toridas. (Translation: Adun hide you.)

Neraz gulio. (Translation: Truth before authority.)

Zerashk gulida! (Translation: Oblivion awaits!)

Ner'mah. (Translation: Cosmic balance.)

仲裁：

Durahs. (Translation: Prepared.)

Dun-a duhn. (Translation: Lead the way.)

Jetakha zohl. (Translation: Establishing vector.)

Daugh-ron. (Translation: With haste.)

Sal'orin kadorr. (Translation: Phase disruptors primed.)

大主教：

Harhak en vaiash。

Shakal zen! (Translation: Vanquish!)

晋升：

Alakor nir shazak.

Na adan korikas.

Ulas zavir.

复仇：

En aras addari.

Templari por Aiur!

航母：

Zara kunul. (Translation: Course set.)

Na azum. (Translation: We concur.)

海盗：

Adun Toridas!

Joh'gaav!

Zhakul guilda!

隐刀：

Khatum. (Translation: Clever.)

毁灭：

Karaz arak shizol.

Rik'kan virok.

Vok'az Shirol.

龙骑：

Gerr aht sutz? (Translation: Awaiting your command.)

Zok kaladas.

Lokh-tai. (Translation: Immediately.)

M'e-jonah. (Translation: Proudly serving.)

Eetakh.

Zinthar kadorr. (Translation: Disruptor primed.)

菲66：

Ee-sa ahtu! (Translation: Foes beware!)

Nahda gahla! (Translation: Already finished!)

电兵：

O lok-natal. (Translation: I will comply.)

Rahlga s'ak-ash! (Translation: Duty is my shield!)

不朽：

Ik s'abeel. (Translation: It is destined.)

技师：

Na ku a'fal Aiur. (Translation: We shall avenge Aiur!)

Shan-ala-ari Daelaam.

Templari paru! (Translation: Justice awaits!)

E-sa ahtu! (Translation: Foes beware!)

幻影：

Lokh-tai. (Translation: Immediately.)

O verash. (Translation: I understand.)

Rono hashik. (Translation: Directive confirmed.)

红母舰：

Rik'kan thok ishar.

Vok'az Shirol!

猎手：

Viras Rakan!

Skosal vin'shir.

石像：

Dura shi s'al. (Translation: My rest is over.)

Addari. (Translation: Your will.)

Khassar. (Translation: Order.)

黄风暴：

Salokim ku ara ki! (Translation: The Purifiers shall rise again.)

Ul'uhn addari. (Translation: By our will.)

Na vazil. (Translation: We terminate.)

先锋：

Sko'rishar vinok.

Viras Rakan!

沃拉尊：

Nas beru s'adarr? (Translation: You seek my service?)

En aru'din Shakuras. (Translation: In memory of Shakuras.)

Neraz gulio. (Translation: Truth before authority.)

Zhakan s'ak-ash! (Translation: The shadows are my shield!)

Zhakul gulida! (Translation: Darkness awaits!)

百夫长：

Na adan sai'osh.

Zerashk gulida!

警戒与军团：

Ul'as addari.

Khassar de templari!

叉子：

Na adan Daelaam.

Orin shi s'al.

Na adan atum.

泽拉图：

S'shozak mok nul。

En aru'din Raszagal.

Aruu nal adan！

使徒：

Na jakar me'nah. (Translation: We serve with pride.)

Por zalah! (Translation: To glory!)
